Description:
Mafia III - New Bordeaux, 1968.
In Vietnam, Lincoln Clay realized one thing: the family - it's not those with whom you grew up, and those for whom you are ready to die. But when the Italian mafia stabs in the back of a black criminal gang, once replaced the Lincoln family, he creates a new family on the ruins of the old and taken revenge, brutally and efficiently. Putting the right people and do not be afraid to get its hands dirty, you can climb to the top of the urban criminal underground. You are waiting for a fierce firefight, brutal melee, dizzying race and difficult decisions.

Repack features : 

Audio Quality / Video quality (100%)
-Game Archives are not touched
-Version: V1.0
Installing additional software (DirectX)
-Installation Time: ~ 60-70 minutes (s) (on the SSD) (Depends on the capacity of the computer)
Bonus for Pre-Order
* Gifts for pre-order - Family rollback: 3 exclusive car lieutenants and gift weapons.
Digital Deluxe Edition
* Includes full game and Season Pass at a discounted price.
* Season Pass gives you access to three major additions that will be released throughout the year. Each of them adds to the game a unique new storylines, characters and gameplay elements. In addition, you get access to exclusive thematic vehicles, weapons and more.
-RePack By VickNet
